model.database

Class TradingAccountsTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.database.DatabaseTable
      • model.database.TradingAccountsTable

  • public class TradingAccountsTable
extends DatabaseTable
    Contains methods that run SQL queries relevant to the TradingAccounts Table. Transfer of money is also handled here
    Since:
    30/10/2018
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Paul King - s3449513

                                 throws java.sql.SQLException

      • addTradingAccount

        public void addTradingAccount(User user,
                              java.lang.String name)
                       throws java.sql.SQLException
        Adds a new trading account to the database for a specific user account
        Parameters:
        user - accepts a user object from the model
        name - this is the name you wish to give the player who owns the new trading account
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException

      • transferFunds

        public boolean transferFunds(TradingAccount sender,
                             TradingAccount receiver,
                             float amount)
                      throws java.sql.SQLException
        Transfers money from one trading account to another by updating the values on the database table
        Parameters:
        sender - This is the account sending the money (used in buying)
        receiver - This is the account receiving the money (used in selling)
        amount - This is the amount of money being transferred between the accounts
        Returns:
        returns true on success, false on failure
        Throws:
        java.sql.SQLException
